query:
SELECT pc.id, pu.name as parent_name, su.name as student_name, pc.relationship
FROM parentChildren pc
JOIN users pu ON pc.parentUserId = pu.id
JOIN students s ON pc.studentId = s.id
JOIN users su ON s.userId = su.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CEWC7GGoWezLtD.root --database ZVkt36csMB4sQeeKBXWHBG --execute

FROM parentChildren pc
JOIN users pu ON pc.parentUserId = pu.id
JOIN students s ON pc.studentId = s.id
JOIN users su ON s.userId = su.id;
